string-array.name: responses
string-array.item: "Hello, How are you?"
"I'm Fine. How about you?"
"I was made at Jetbrain Robotics."
"its 12 august 2019"
"There are many excercises out there. Mine is really "taking fresh air"
"I recommend you to stay fit and healthy. I recommend you to drink a lot of water everyday. I recommend having faith in positive behaviours"
"the main reason I’m on here is to just meet some cool people with no expectations and see where things go."
"My self Arya, I belong from jetbrain robotics. I love to recommend people you to stay fit and healthy. That's all about me."
"Yes. It's Jesus."

string-array.name: queries

string-array.name: welcome_text
string-array.item: "Welcome to Aon CoCubes exclusive partner event – Connect 2019."
"Its an honor and privilege to have your presence at Connect 2019."
"Thank you for partnering with us and creating “Equal Opportunity” for every student."
"Thank you for the trust you have bestowed in us."
"We look forward to a great 2020 placement season."
"Here’s hoping you have a memorable experience at Connect 2019."
